      public void readCommand(GameController controller)
      Reads the command input by the user and sends to the controller to be handled and potentially preform an action.

    • getInteractiveColour

      public BeadColour getInteractiveColour()
      Prompts the user to enter a colour and returns the corresponding BeadColour.
      Returns:
      The chosen BeadColour.

    • readInteractiveMoveCommand

      public Move readInteractiveMoveCommand(GameController controller)
      Prompts the user to enter a move and returns the corresponding Move.
      Parameters:
      controller - The game controller to send the move to.
      Returns:
      The chosen Move.

    • isValidMove

      private boolean isValidMove(String input)
      Checks if the given input is a valid move.
      Parameters:
      input - The input to check.
      Returns:
      True if the input is a valid move, false otherwise.

    • convertToMove

      private Move convertToMove(String input, GameController controller)
      Converts the given input into a Move.
      Parameters:
      input - The input to convert.
      controller - The game controller to get the current player's colour from.
      Returns:
      The Move corresponding to the input.

    • parseAddBeadCommand

      public Move parseAddBeadCommand(String input, BeadColour beadColour)
      Parses a command to add a bead to the game board in testing mode.
      Parameters:
      input - The command input string.
      beadColour - The colour of the bead to be added.
      Returns:
      A Move object representing the add bead command.

    • parseRemoveBeadCommand

      public int[] parseRemoveBeadCommand(String input)
      Parses a command to remove a bead from the game board in testing mode.
      Parameters:
      input - The command input string.
      Returns:
      An array of two integers representing the row and column of the bead to be removed.
